short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download this free extension to join Chrome de la Chrome's pilot program!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the chrome extension for Chrome de la Chrome's pilot program.

Receive one absurdly good, hyper-relevant, 24hr exploding deal in your inbox daily - just for sharing your anonymized, aggregated browsing data. 

How it works:

1. Download the CLDC Chrome extension, sign up, input basic demo details, and allow browsing tracking.

2. Based on the sites you visit (never stored on CDLC servers) CDLC will assign broad "tags" to your profile like "Gaming Enthusiast," "Budding Chef," or "High-End Fashionista." These tags (never personal information) are shared with brands.

3. CDLC works with brands to get the right absurdly good deals to the right people, sent once daily to your inbox by CDLC.

â€‹Reach out to Buzz at cdlc.connect@gmail.com with any questions.

Visit cdlcpilot.com for more information.
